JobFullDesc: Job DescriptionAt Boeing, we innovate and collaborate to make the world a better place. Find your future with us.We are Boeing Research & Technology:  Boeing's Global Research & Development team creating and implementing innovative technologies that make the impossible possible and enabling the future of aerospace.  We are engineers and technicians, skilled scientists and bold innovators.Boeing Research and Technology, Boeing’s Global Research and Development team, is looking to hire a motivated, self-starting Deputy Chief Engineer into our team. As Deputy Chief Engineer you will demonstrated knowledge and experience across a wide range of disciplines necessary to develop a test facility such as systems engineering, systems analysis, mechanical/fluid design, rotating machinery, control systems, and test. This position will contribute to the design, development, test and operations of a process plant/facility with rotating machinery, heat exchangers, instrumentation and control systems. As a senior principal engineer you will develop processes related analysis and design methodology and act as a technical advisor to help solve complex problems.  The Deputy Chief Engineer is an integral part of the project leadership teamIn pursuit of Boeing's research and business interests, the successful candidate will:Work on leading edge technologies across the enterprise and at
